pokemon.name: Garchomp
pokemon.description: The mach pokemon, When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

pokemon.name: Electivire
pokemon.description: Thunderbolt Pokémon, When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars and electric sparks shower all around.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.description: The flame pokemon, f Charizard becomes truly angered, the flame at the tip of its tail burns in a light blue shade.

pokemon.name: Serperior
pokemon.description: The Regal pokemon, it can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare

pokemon.name: Samurott
pokemon.description: The Formidable Pokémon, A master of a sword-drawing art called iaijutsu, Samurott settles its battles with a single swing of either large sword sheathed in its foreleg armor.

pokemon.name: Reshiram
pokemon.description: The vast white pokemon, when Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather

pokemon.name: Zekrom
pokemon.description: The Deep Black Pokémon, This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

pokemon.name: Hydreigon
pokemon.description: The brutal pokemon, it responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three headed pokemon devours everything in it's path.

pokemon.name: Darkrai
pokemon.description: The pitch-black pokemon, Folklore has it that on moonless nights, this Pokémon will make people see horrific nightmares.

pokemon.name: Sceptile
pokemon.description: The forest pokemon, the leaves growing on its back are very sharp edged. This pokemon is very agile-it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind

pokemon.name: Metagross
pokemon.description: The metal leg pokemon, Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

pokemon.name: Giritina
pokemon.description: Renegade Pokémon, It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

pokemon.name: Empoleon
pokemon.description: The emperor pokemon, the three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns

pokemon.name: Scizor
pokemon.description: The pincer pokemon, Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It's not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This pokemon flaps it's wings to regulate it's body temperature

pokemon.name: Gardevoir
pokemon.description: The embrace pokemon, To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

pokemon.name: Palkia
pokemon.description: The spacial pokemon, It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

pokemon.name: Reuniclus
pokemon.description: The multiplying pokemon, They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders physically.

pokemon.name: Beheeyem
pokemon.description: The cerebral pokemon, It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.

pokemon.name: Bisharp
pokemon.description: The sword blade pokemon, No matter how strong the Bisharp, it’s said that if the blade on its head is chipped, it will retire from its position as the boss.

pokemon.name: Arceus
pokemon.description: The alpha pokemon, It is described in mythology as the Pokémon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
